name: Mystery Bomb
description:
One action can change everything...

You wake up in a strange building, and find yourself next to a bomb, which is imminent to explode...

But you can't delay the inevitable... can you?

Only mouse is required.

Be carefull... Remember that it takes time to get to another room (literally)
